summary: Results-driven programming enthusiast since young; I am a graduate in computer science from the University of East Anglia skilled in problem solving with strong motivation to constantly improve.
footerText: I built this website using React.

experience.title: Full stack web developer internship
experience.description: Worked as a full stack web developer in a team to build a bespoke e-commerce website for a client from the ground up.

experience.title: UEA App Development Internship
experience.description: Worked in a team with other interns to develop a mobile application for a client using the Scrum Agile framework.

experience.title: Freelance Web Developer
experience.description: Maintained the e-commerce website that was built bespoke during my internship.

experience.title: Software Engineering Associate Tutor
experience.description: Provided assistance and teaching to students that requested it in computer labs for a 2nd year module while I was in my 3rd year of studies.

education.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: I achieved a first-class honours in BSc Computer Science at UEA with 79% overall and 85.5% in my dissertation/project. During this course, I studied graphics, computer vision, networking, parallel computation, and more. I was awarded best individual performance in my final year.
